novel RNN - based model.for: joint extraction of entity mentions and relations
novel RNN - based model.from sentence: In this paper , we propose a novel RNN - based model for the joint extraction of entity mentions and relations .

does not.from sentence: Unlike other models , our model does not depend on any dependency tree information .

Our RNN - based model.from sentence: Our RNN - based model is a multi - layer bidirectional LSTM over a sequence .

output sequence.from sentence: We encode the output sequence from left - to - right .

each time step.from sentence: At each time step , we use an attention - like model on the previously decoded time steps , to identify the tokens in a specified relation with the current token .

additional layer.from sentence: We also add an additional layer to our network to encode the output sequence from right - to - left and find significant improvement on the performance of relation identification using bi-directional encoding .
